9AD1C1EEA909435FA3F75871704AC974.description:
Advanced: Compose and improvise
musical ideas for a variety of purposes
and contexts.

9CD1E85F8C82468B9DA1C8CD717C0B17.description:
Accomplished: Compose and improvise
ideas for arrangements, sections, and
short compositions for specific
purposes that reflect characteristic(s) of
music from a variety of cultures studied
in rehearsal.

3221E5443BE24E79B53198FAC24D2794.description:
Proficient: Compose and improvise
ideas for melodies, rhythmic passages,
and arrangements for specific purposes
that reflect characteristic(s) of music from a
variety of historical periods studied in
rehearsal.

7D246E63030344CF8F41E432B8DFE5E8.description:
Intermediate: Compose and improvise
ideas for melodies and rhythmic
passages based on characteristic(s) of
music or text(s) studied in rehearsal.

D27245D33C694F65B5358D30D4AB9635.description:
Novice: Compose and improvise
melodic and rhythmic ideas or motives
that reflect characteristic(s) of music or
text(s) studied in rehearsal.

8245E67BFE144D31A4A30CC6DB4FBC6E.description: Imagine: Generate musical ideas for various purposes and contexts.
